entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
